title: Crypto bottoms ‘rarely occur’ when everyone says they do: Santiment
summary: Crypto sentiment platform Santiment warned that when many people start calling a crypto market bottom, it’s wise to stay skeptical.

title: Crypto oversight by CFTC over SEC is ‘directionally correct’ — Jeff Park
summary: Jeff Park’s pro-CFTC comments come just days after US senators introduced a bill pushing to shift crypto oversight from the SEC to the CFTC.

title: BItcoin hits 6-month low as AI fears add to risk-off mood: How are pro traders positioned?
summary: The weakness in the AI sector contributed to the crypto market downturn, as spot BTC ETF outflows and isolated selling sent Bitcoin price to a six-month low.

title: SOL drops to 5-month low despite Solana spot ETF success: Is $100 next?
summary: Solana ETFs recorded inflows for 13 consecutive days, but SOL price lost key technical support levels, sparking fears of a drop to $100.

title: Probability of December interest rate cut falls below 50%
summary: Nearly 67% of investors forecast an interest rate cut of 25 basis points in December when polled during the first week of November.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
summary: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: BitMine appoints new CEO amid Ether buying spree
summary: BitMine held about $11 billion worth of ETH as of this week, making it the largest Ether treasury in the cryptocurrency industry.

title: Bitcoin miners retreat sharply as BTC pulls back from recent highs
summary: Major mining stocks dropped 20%–50% this week, erasing billions in value as the sector continued to lag Bitcoin’s latest pullback.

title: Bitcoin's 2-year trend is about to collapse: Will bulls defend $90K?
summary: Bitcoin lost multiple critical support areas as data show short-term investors holding on to capitulation-level losses, raising fears of a deeper breakdown in BTC price.

title: Binance adds BlackRock’s BUIDL as off-exchange collateral for institutional traders
summary: The integration marks another step in centralized exchanges adopting tokenized Treasurys, expanding RWA collateral across major trading platforms.
